# Install
```shell script
pip install -U namekox-core
```

# Usage
> namekox --help
```
usage: namekox [-h] [-v] {shell,run,create,config} ...

positional arguments:
  {shell,run,create,config}
    shell               launch an interactive shell
    run                 run one or more services
    create              create micro services
    config              show yaml string config

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -v, --version         show program's version number and exit
```
